testcase.name: Verify whether User is able to access - VMS Application MSP User
Adjust Dashboard MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given In Dashboard, click the Setting Icon in the top right hand corner.....passed Then User can Add New Widget, Save dashboard configuration, empty dashboard and close editing.passed

testcase.name: View and Adjust User Settings MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given In Dashboard, click user icon picture in bottom left corner; a flyout window will open and click on ""Account Settings"".passed When User can change specific items on user, including user photo...........passed Then If changes made, click ""Save""".......................................passed

testcase.name: Add Job in system MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given Click the second icon on the left navigation panel....................passed Then A flyout window will appear. Click on ""Create Job""...................passed Then On the job template field, enter the job title or look for the desired job title under "Recent Job Templates" or "Popular Job Templates".passed Then Select the job manager - work location will be auto populated; continue to select program industry.passed Then Click on "Continue" button"............................................passed

testcase.name: Add Job in system MSP User 2
testcase.system-out: Given In second page of Add Job, selected the estimated started and end dates of the Job,number of positions, expense allowed, Currency, Unit of Measure, Min and Max Bill Rate, and Over time exempt.passed Then Post entry, scroll down to end of page to view the budget..............passed Then Click "view detailed estimate" to view the components that add up to create the budget; change details as needed.passed Then Click "Continue".......................................................passed

testcase.name: Add Job in system MSP User 3
testcase.system-out: Given The foundational data will be defaulted based on the selection made . Click each field to make changes if necessary.passed Then Click "Submit" to create the job.......................................passed

testcase.name: View Job Workflow on Job Requisition MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given Once submitted, the user will be shown the details of the job created.passed Then Click on the approvals tab on the job detatils page to view the approval workflow.passed Then You should see the first level of approval as the Hiring Manager and the second level of approval as HM+1".passed

testcase.name: Approve Step 1 of Job Requisition Client User/HM
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Hiring manager using the credentials for the Hiring Manager..passed Then From the dashboard under pending actions widget, click on jobs pending approval.passed Then Select the job created and either click on the approval tab or on the Pending approval button on the top right corner of the screen..passed Then Click on approve.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Approve Step 2 of Job Requisition Client User/HM
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Hiring manager+1 using the credentials for the Hiring Manager+1.passed Then From the dashboard under pending actions widget, click on jobs pending approval.passed Then Select the job created and either click on the approval tab or on the Pending approval button on the top right corner of the screen..passed Then Click on approve.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Release Job to supplier/s MSP User
testcase.system-out: Given Log back in as the MSP User, click on the briefcase icon on the left navigation panel and from the flyout window select View All jobs.passed Then Click on the Job title of the Job you're working on....................passed Then Job Details should open and you will find an actions button on the top right corner of the screen;.passed Then select Distribute......................................................passed Then This will bring the user to the distribute tab and the user can type to search the vendors.passed Then Once added, Click on Enbale Submission Limit toggle to set it ON or OFF.passed Then Click on Distribute....................................................passed

testcase.name: Create and Submit Candidate as Vendor
testcase.system-out: Given Login as Supplier to which job was distributed........................passed Then In the user's dashboard, from "Pending Actions" widgets click on "New Job Requests".passed Then This will open Jobs needing submittal..................................passed Then Click on the job you created; this will redirect you to "Job Details" Section.passed Then Click on the actions button on the top right corner and select.........passed And add & submit candidate to create and submit candidate...................passed And Submit candidate to select candidates from the list of available candidates.passed Then Fill in the necessary details and click on submit candidate............passed

testcase.name: Shortlist candidate/s as Program MSP user
testcase.system-out: Given Login as the MSP user.................................................passed Then In Pending Actions click on Resumes to Review. Alternatively, navigate to the job from the left navigation pane and click on the job you are working on. You should be able to see a tab named Submitted Candidates.passed Then This will bring up list of all submitted candidates. You can either review each one by clicking the Candidate's name.passed Then Review the candidate details. Click on "Reject" to review Rejection reasons in module; for this exercise, click "Shortlist".passed

testcase.name: Schedule Interview MSP user
testcase.system-out: Given On the candidate details page, after reviewing the candidate - click on Schedule Interview on the right side of the page.passed Then This will redirect to the schedule interview page......................passed Then Fill in the relevant details and click on schedule interview...........passed

testcase.name: Accept Interview MSP user
testcase.system-out: Given Login as the Vendor of the candidate Accept Interview.................passed Then click the pending action...............................................passed Then Select the candidate you were working on and click on the candidates name.passed Then Accept_button..........................................................passed Then interview_and_select_Accept............................................passed

testcase.name: Create Offer for Candidate MSP user
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to the job from the left navigation pane and click on the job you are working on.passed Then This will bring up list of all submitted candidatesYou can either review each one by clicking the Candidate's name.passed Then Click on the candidate you wish to create offer for and head to offers tab in the candidates detail page.passed Then Fill in all the relevant details.......................................passed

testcase.name: Accept Offer as Supplier Client Vendor
testcase.failure:
Given Log in as Supplier you are using......................................passed Then Click on Pending Offers under Pending Actions..........................passed Then Click on Candidate name for whom the offer was created in step 15......failed Then Click on Reject Offer or click Accept Offer............................skipped

testcase.name: Approve Timesheet Client User/HM
testcase.system-out: Given Log in as Hiring Manager..............................................passed Then Click Timesheet Pending Approval under Pending Actions.................passed Then You can open up the Timesheet and view details of the timesheet and click on approve.passed

testcase.name: Enter Expense by Worker- Candidate(Vendor)
testcase.system-out: Given Log in as Worker Vendor...............................................passed Then Click on the second icon clock icon on the eft navigation pane and click on View General Expenses.passed Then Click on the blue + icon near the Expense list.........................passed Then Select the assignment you wish to add the expense for and click Continue.passed Then Click on Add expense...................................................passed Then Select the Day for the Expense, Expense Type, Amount, and Receipt attachment - click Add Expense.passed Then You can add more expenses for the Expense Sheet by clicking Add Expense. Once you are finished, click Submit for Approval.passed

testcase.name: MSP User/Vendor Modify Expense
testcase.system-out: Given Log in as MSP User or Vendor..........................................passed Then Msp View General Expenses..............................................passed Then Open an Expense that is pending for approval and Withdrawn.............passed Then You can adjust the Expense entered then select the Reasons for Modification and click.passed
